text: Rauma is a city in Finland on the southwest coast. It is most famous for the wooden architecture of its old city centre, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The smallest street in the country, is in the city; The street is a little wider than 2.50 m.https://yle.fi/a/74-20109439.
